memberSignatures.value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolutionResult ResolveType(class System.Type type) cil managed

returns.summary:
An unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result if <paramref name="type" />
            is an array or a primitive type; a successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.RecordResolution" /> result
            otherwise.

overloads.summary: Resolves class, interface, or struct type information.
